title: Future Imperfect
description: Jo is an unlikely heroine. At 27 we find her skipping through a charmed life in 20th Century Chelsea. But fate intercepts and hurls her onto a collision course with Michael; a headstrong impulsive teenager who drags her kicking and screaming 500 years into the future and his strange underground city of blonde-haired, blue-eyed citizens, mentally superior to her in every way.Jo must dig deep to find an inner strength she would never have thought possible in her previous life.â€‹
author: Cheryl Youngman
